      • initialize

        public void initialize(Ode ode,
              EventFunction ef,
              StateObserver stateObserver,
              EventObserver eventObserver)
                throws CVodeSolver.JniInitializationException
        Description copied from interface: Solver
        Initialize the solver.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface Solver
        Parameters:
        ode - the ODE to solve
        ef - the function defining the roots to be found
        stateObserver - the observer of the states at the integration time-steps
        eventObserver - the observer of the root functions
        Throws:
        CVodeSolver.JniInitializationException

      • integrate

        public double integrate(double t0,
               double[] x0,
               double t1)
                 throws Solver.NotImplementedException
        Description copied from interface: Solver
        Integrate the ODE.
        Specified by:
        integrate in interface Solver
        Parameters:
        t0 - the start time of the integration
        x0 - the initial state
        t1 - the stop time of the integration
        Returns:
        the time where the integration has stopped
        Throws:
        Solver.NotImplementedException - if the solver only implements integration with TimepointProviders

      • integrate

        public double integrate()
                 throws ch.ethz.khammash.ode.cvode.CVodeSolver.CVodeIntegrationException,
                        Solver.NotYetInitializedException
        Description copied from interface: Solver
        Integrate the ODE. The user is responsible to call Solver.prepare(ch.ethz.khammash.ode.TimepointProvider, double[]) before calling this function.
        Specified by:
        integrate in interface Solver
        Returns:
        the time where the integration has stopped
        Throws:
        Solver.NotYetInitializedException - if Solver.initialize(ch.ethz.khammash.ode.Ode, ch.ethz.khammash.ode.EventFunction, ch.ethz.khammash.ode.StateObserver, ch.ethz.khammash.ode.EventObserver) has not been called before
        ch.ethz.khammash.ode.cvode.CVodeSolver.CVodeIntegrationException
